title.rendered: Metaplanet raises 4B JPY in 0% interest bonds to buy more BTC

content.rendered: Metaplanet, known as the “Microstrategy of Asia,” has raised an additional 4 billion JPY in zero-interest bonds to buy more Bitcoin.

excerpt.rendered: Metaplanet, known as the “Microstrategy of Asia,” has raised an additional 4 billion JPY in zero-interest bonds to buy more Bitcoin.
